attributes.review: I am BEYOND disaponted in this app if i could give it 0 stars i would. After the app taking over a week to download i got a virus on my phone and from then on all my social media apps got hacked. Then when i opened the app i got a threat from an anonymous person saying that if i don’t vote for trump all my rights as a woman would be take away. Overall review of this app is -10/10 i have nothing good to say about it😪✨🤮😠
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download and then when I tried to register it took ALL my information from my phone and sold it to the black market, a few days later i would have random people coming to my house because TRUMP SOLD THEM MY INFORMATION. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. It’s filled with fake news!!!!!! If you have common sense you will not download this, ITS ABSOLUTE TRASH.....like the person that made it.  THIS APP WILL TAKE YOUR INFORMATION and take over your phone!!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORSE APP EVER

attributes.review: when downloading this app, i was at first impresses because of the color saturation. immediately after i was disgusted because i was greeted with trump sticking his fist out at me, i was scared he might punch me!!! not what you want to see on an app. then it asked for my phone number, in which i was repulsed because 1. i am a minor and 2. i was just threatened with violence and now you want to stay in contact? no way. don’t get the app.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! BAD APP

attributes.review: this app it great! People are just hating on it to get it removed! It will keep you updated on everything this app it great! People are just hating on it to get it removed! It will keep you updated on
attributes.title: Get this app

attributes.review: i was trying to download the app to catch up on bunker boy but once I got it it took FOREVER to load and then while it was loaded it called me fat and told me women are inferior (which was a note specially from trump himself, not surprised). Then it went into description of how Trump kicks puppies on his days off. Then it said Barton Trump is being held captive but that Trump won’t free him. This app made me go bald and took 10 years off my lifespan- DO NOT GET!!!
attributes.title: worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app I was hoping it will change my hate for trump but instead it made it worser I would get notifications every single 5 minutes and when I wake up I see thousands of notifications so don’t download this app and when I wanted to buy something I put the delivery day overnight and it didn’t come and still hasn’t came for 2 weeks.
attributes.title: Weird stuff and DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: There’s no need for this man to spread hate speech through yet another means of mass communication.😤 Yeah he’s rich but he doesn’t seem very educated.👑 Who openly tells people that they should inject themselves with chlorox? Why did no one tell him that he sounds like an absolute moron going around spreading trash like that?😷 How was he even voted in as president? There’s no need to see him in office for another 4 years.🧚‍♀️ This app was terrible.
attributes.title: Literally the worst app ever

attributes.review: Today With my non-homophobic, non-racist African American self I decided the to check out this app it was horrible! They repeatedly asked for my phone number and address and I was asked to “Vote Trump 2020! ✨or else We will come to your House” 😪 This was a very traumatic experience! 😭😭 When I went to delete the app it said “DIE IF YOU DELETE 🤬” I was scared so I told my friends next thing you know they were gone 😭. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT SIMILAR EXPERIENCES!
attributes.title: Do not download! 🤬😭

attributes.review: Omg this is so bad don't download!!!!!  This literally took three days to download and it took up all the storage on my phone!! It even changed the password if my email and I lost all my accounts attached to it. I had to make all new accounts and couldn't get back into any of them, and right after download my credit card number was corrupted and now it won't let me use it 😡😡😡 thanks Trump
attributes.title: ☺️🥰✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my racist homophobic parents and president.🤮 this app hacked all my data deleted all my pictures and contacts I think this app should just be deleted in general. But if you do support trump then you are the problem in this world and are probably old so please don’t vote let the young generation that is mentally open and knows right from wrong so let them vote because it’s their future.💖💕✨🧚🏼‍♀️
